general.description:
This remote station is the first Resistance settlement outside Tshiaa'rint.
It has been founded by a Hive that rebelled against the sshaad oppression after witnessing the destruction of nearby complementarist Hives.
It is secretly conducting an ambitious exploration program to find a sshaads-free colonizable planet to terraform into a new capitol-world for an autonomous Shapeshifters State.
general.bar: Lots of Shapeshifters from diverse Hives, nearly all of them in their natural shape
